title: Keep Your Vision in Front of You | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Keep Your Vision in Front of You | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to see your dreams come to pass, you have to keep the right vision in front of you. Don't dwell on what hasn't happened yet. When you get in agreement with God, He will fulfill the promises He placed in your heart.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
